name: Night Fall: Power of the Sun
name_original: Night Fall: Power of the Sun
description:
DESCRIPTION

Night Fall (Power of The Sun) is an upcoming wave-based survival shooter focused on moving around a strange and mysterious desert. 

You play as an adventurer who's tasked with destroying the sun and saving the planet. You must activate a set of pyramid columns as you explore a world of strange creatures, treacherous storms, and mysterious architecture. 

Play as you unravel the underground warfare behind this land and the sun. 

Key Features
- Resourceful survival
- Compelling and hidden story
- Whimsical visuals

REQUIREMENTS

Windows Requirements:
- Windows 7 64-bit or later. 
- Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
- NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
- 4 GB RAM or more.
